## Documentation Issue
What documentation needs to be improved?

## Current State
Describe what's currently documented (or missing).

## Proposed Changes
What changes would you like to see?

## Additional Context
- Links to relevant code/files
- Screenshots if applicable
- Examples of good documentation you've seen elsewhere

## Checklist
- [ ] I have checked that this documentation issue doesn't already exist
- [ ] The documentation change is clear and actionable
- [ ] I've included links to relevant code or files
